description: General Artififact informational drawbacks within the OSRS CMCF are related to instances where information from an artifiact is found missing, irrelevant, not congruent, or not complete based on the information supplied within the artifact.  The informational drawbacks allow for the tracking of these types of informational defficiencies.
name: OSRS General Artifact Informational Drawbacks

values.description: The artifact contains GDBI information that is uncertain, indefinite, or unclear of character or meaning.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact GDBI Vague

values.description: The artifact relates to a data breach but does not sufficiently describe the event with enough context to understand how the breach happended and so therefore the information that would explain this context is considered missing (or) absent.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact GDBI Information Absent

values.description: The artifact contains GECI related information that is uncertain, indefinite, or unclear of character or meaning.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact GECI Vague

values.description: The artifact contains GECI related information that does not align to the current GECI mapping.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact GECI No Relevant Category

values.description: The artifact relates to GECI information but does not sufficiently describe the event with enough context to understand which GECI to map to and so therefore the information that would explain this context is considered missing (or) absent.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact GECI Information Absent

values.description: The artifact contains US State related information that is uncertain, indefinite, or unclear of character or meaning.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact US State Index Vague

values.description: The artifact contains US State related information that does not align to the current US State mapping.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact US State Index No Relevant Category

values.description: The artifact relates to US State information but does not sufficiently describe the event with enough context to understand which US State to map to and so therefore the information that would explain this context is considered missing (or) absent.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact US State Index Information Absent

values.description: The artifact contains BLS related information that is uncertain, indefinite, or unclear of character or meaning.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact BLS Vague

values.description: The artifact contains BLS related information that does not align to the current BLS mapping.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact BLS No Relevant Category

values.description: The artifact relates to BLS information but does not sufficiently describe the event with enough context to understand which BLS to map to and so therefore the information that would explain this context is considered missing (or) absent.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact BLS Information Absent

values.description: The artifact contains data breach related information that does not align to the current General Data Breach Index mapping.
values.value: OSRS CMCF General Artifact Informational Drawback: General Artifact GDBI No Relevant Category
